attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No more Winterville
No more complaints about our centuries old celebration and tradition. 
More Christmas cards and no xmas cards
No more bowing to the minority at the expense of Christian values and faith.
No more fear of being called racist because we dont believe as others do even though we respect our differences and are an embracing and welcoming society in Britain.

Mr Brown please take a stand for Christ this Christmas and for all Christmas's to come. 

Yours through Jesus

Eileen laoudi

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
